import React, { Component } from 'react' import './user.css' class SignIn extends Component { state = { name: "", password: "" } handleNameChange = (event) => { this.setState({name: event.target.name}) console.log('new name is ' + event.target.value) } handlePasswordChange = (event) => { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } handleSubmit = (event) => { console.log('New submit: ' + event.target.name + ' , ' + event.target.password) } render() { return (
{ //

}
Forgot Password?
) } } export default SignIn
